name: Blue_Mint2
description: Loose sketches of girl figures caught in a flow of emotions. A bit of hope on top of resignation, hesitation and melancholy. Exploration of flow, hand drawing, fast sketches and visible paint strokes. Created fully digitally in Photoshop. Mint 2 (out of 6) Edition of 5.  Mint 2 is also a figurative one - Girl sketches are brought to the front and the layer is broken with a visible geometric pattern. This Edition is a natural continuation.  Warsaw, FuzOne 30 04 2021
